actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Secretary of the Senate and any other Senate employee in the case of "Avirgan v. Hull" (S.D. Fla.).

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Secretary of the Senate and any Senate employee who may be substituted as a respondent in the case of Avirgan v. Hull, No. 86-1146-CIV-KING (S.D. Fla.), or in any ancillary proceedings.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Secretary of the Senate and any other Senate employee in the case of "Avirgan v. Hull" (S.D. Fla.).
